configuration-file.help: Loads the named config on startup

net-file.help: Use FILE as SUMO-network to route on

additional-files.help: Read additional network data (districts, bus stops) from FILE(s)

route-files.synonymes: alternative-files alternatives-files f flow-files flows r t trip-files trips
route-files.help: Read sumo routes, alternatives, flows, and trips from FILE(s)

with-taz.help: Use origin and destination zones (districts) for in- and output

randomize-flows.help: generate random departure times for flow input

begin.help: Defines the begin time; Previous trips will be discarded

end.help: Defines the end time; Later trips will be discarded; Defaults to the maximum time that SUMO can represent

random.help: Initialises the random number generator with the current system time

seed.help: Initialises the random number generator with the given value
